New Records: Jared McCain scored 34 points and had 10 assists in his first career start
Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell scored 23 points, including 11 in the fourth quarter to help the Cavaliers win
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Nick Nurse highlighted Jared McCain's ability to share the ball and play the game the right way
Post-Match Reflections: Caleb Martin expressed optimism about the team's progress despite the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers improved to 13-0, matching the sixth best start in NBA history
The article referenced historical examples like the 1977-78 Seattle SuperSonics and the 2021-22 Celtics starting with poor records but making the Finals
